select
from webstarter_uam_group order by show_order

select
from webstarter_uam_group where parent_id=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by show_order

select
from webstarter_uam_group where data_state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by show_order

select
from webstarter_uam_group where data_state ='enable' and code like '${longCode}%' order by show_order

from webstarter_uam_group where data_state ='enable' and type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by show_order
